column1: The wind measurement campaign that has generated this data was commissioned by The World Bank with funding from the Energy Sector Management Assistance Program (ESMAP).
The data is made freely available under The World Bank’s open data policy.
Equipment : 80 m Triangular Guyed Lattice Tower
10 minute averaged data, computed from at least 1 Hz observations
Address : 6 Quai à la Chaux - 1000 Bruxelles - Belgium
time : Date and Time according to ISO8601 (YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm)
dX_wind_direction_mean : Wind direction in degrees North, counted clockwise
dX_wind_direction_stddev : Wind direction in degrees North, counted clockwise-standard deviation
pX_air_pressure_mean : Mean sea level air pressure in hPa
pX_air_pressure_stddev : Mean sea level air pressure in hPa- standard deviation
aX_turbulence_intensity : 10-minute standard deviation of the wind speed divided by the mean wind speed during that same time interval
- missing data : no data recorded over the period
- erroneous - all zeros : all aggregators (e.g. mean, min, max, stddev) equals to zero. Data likely incorrect
- flat line : no change of the mean value over a certain period. Data likely incorrect
- out of range : data out of typical range for the given parameter

column2: the entries are specific to each anemometer with X indicating its height.
